about_the_game:
"Subway Exorcist Girl" is a small-scale suspenseful horror game developed by a single person, inspired by "Exit 8". The game features elements of "roguelike" randomness.

*（Due to the game being developed with RPG Maker MV, the controls and interactions may feel somewhat "stiff" or "rough" and may not have the smoothness and natural flow of a Unity engine game. Please note this, and only consider purchasing if you're willing to accept these aspects.）

Game Features

  • The game has certain random elements, and you cannot predict the terrifying phenomena you will encounter next. Each death and rebirth presents you with completely different crises, and your previous exploration experience cannot help you or provide a sense of security. The randomly occurring horror phenomena and monsters add to the fear.

  • Players must identify all abnormalities and find a way to eliminate them, ensuring that they do not overlook anything in order to safely reach the end. Otherwise, they will be continuously killed and reborn by an indescribable unknown evil force.

  • Based on the gameplay of horror suspense and light roguelike elements, the game features a certain level of narrative and character development. The dark, eerie atmosphere of the subway is filled with the unknown and mysteries. Players explore and interact with various characters, monsters, and anomalies to gain an immersive role-playing experience and narrative insights.

  • The game will showcase refreshing monster designs and bizarre horror imagery, aiming to create a strong psychological horror atmosphere and incomprehensible terrifying scenes.

With the continuous arrival of the unknown and surprises, do you dare to challenge?
detailed_description:

*（Due to the game being developed with RPG Maker MV, the controls and interactions may feel somewhat "stiff" or "rough" and may not have the smoothness and natural flow of a Unity engine game. Please note this, and only consider purchasing if you're willing to accept these aspects.）

Game Features

  • The game has certain random elements, and you cannot predict the terrifying phenomena you will encounter next. Each death and rebirth presents you with completely different crises, and your previous exploration experience cannot help you or provide a sense of security. The randomly occurring horror phenomena and monsters add to the fear.

  • Players must identify all abnormalities and find a way to eliminate them, ensuring that they do not overlook anything in order to safely reach the end. Otherwise, they will be continuously killed and reborn by an indescribable unknown evil force.

  • Based on the gameplay of horror suspense and light roguelike elements, the game features a certain level of narrative and character development. The dark, eerie atmosphere of the subway is filled with the unknown and mysteries. Players explore and interact with various characters, monsters, and anomalies to gain an immersive role-playing experience and narrative insights.

name: Subway Exorcist Girl

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: A subway train plagued by strange occurrences. A part-time exorcist girl arrives to confront the supernatural chaos, with the unknown ahead.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
